document_data.mainbody:
Owaren Kendrick was the youngest son of High King Derid Kendrick of the Moonshae Isles in the .
Owaren was kidnapped by Lady Erliza Daressin and taken to the island of Snowdown were he was held as a hostage to ensure that High King Derid did not try to wrest control of Snowdown from her and her Amnian allies. He was held within Caer Westphal.
